xmlText.p: First Period_1, Vancouver, Eriksson 7 (Vanek), 1:02. 2, Vancouver, Eriksson 8 (Horvat), 3:50. 3, Vancouver, Vanek 14 (Eriksson), 5:49. 4, Los Angeles, Iafallo 4 (Brown, Kopitar), 8:01. 5, Vancouver, Baertschi 10 (Del Zotto, Vanek), 10:02 (pp). Second Period_6, Vancouver, Boeser 23 (Edler, Horvat), 4:21 (pp). 7, Los Angeles, Kopitar 19 (Muzzin, Doughty), 5:48 (pp). 8, Vancouver, Boeser 24 (Edler, Gagner), 7:57 (pp).
